attributes.action: enforce tighter rules and regulations on social networking websites such as 'Bebo' to help prevent the increasing problem paedophilia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many hours are spent each day by teenagers on social networking websites such as 'Bebo' and 'MySpace'. This petition is calling for tighter rules and regulations to be enforced on these websites to make it more difficult for paedophiles to access the huge amount of personal information publicly provided by young chilren.
